The United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025  strengthens the United States Department of Agriculture's ability to  improve grain grading technologies through flexibilities to pursue…

Ms. CRAIG. Mr. Speaker, every summer, grains planted by hardworking  Minessotans cover around 40 percent of my district.

U.S. grain standards are a key component of foreign trade and the  promotion of American agricultural exports. The inspections and  certifications done by the Federal Grain Inspection Service,…

Mr. THOMPSON of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the  rules and pass the bill (H.R. 4550) to reauthorize the United States  Grain Standards Act, and for other purposes.

The Clerk read the title of the bill.
